column2:
Even though they were insanely busy, we received incredibly good service, little problem with our 5pm booking, manageress went out of her way to oblige us.
Surprising queue for carvety quicker than expected, and the waitresses very attentive, without being intrusive.
I accidentally left my wallet on the floor, and they phoned me within a couple mins to let me know they found it, brilliant!!!!!

Absolutely breathtaking, a walk through history.
The reason for this review is to make people aware there is disabled access to the Acropolis, to the left of the entrance is a manned disabled entrance, show tickets, follow path to left and there is a manned lift, which takes you right to the top.
Thank you for this service.

This place became our regular haunt for dinner & or lunch during our 2 week stay n Athens.
Staff are friendly, service is very good and the food was lovely.
Great advice about dishes, and good local advice.
Nearly forgot, prices are very reasonable too
Highly recommended, we will definitely be back.

column1: Amazing value for money, service brilliant.
column2:
Been here twice now in week, 1st time with my wife and we loved it, amazing selection of food, and staff very attentive.
Incredible value for money, amazing range of food, staff really good too.
I'll be back every week I hope, can't recommend any higher.

Really friendly place, room better than pictures, very spacious.
Dinner was excellent, from starter to desert, and extremely good value for money.
Breakfast is the best I've ever had, large full Irish and continental too, but with boiled bacon and chicken breast slices, I'd move in!

Staff really helpful and informative.

Lovely, definitely coming back.

(good veggie choices too and milk substitutes readily available)

column1: Absolutely brilliant, holiday of a lifetime.
column2:
Absolutely brilliant, so many more features than advertised.
Everywhere incredibly clean, the cleanest toilets I've ever been in, restaurants spotless, tables immediately cleared, lovely.
Room, cleaned twice a day, room service amazing, full breakfast served in room if required, and dinner can be had on the beach too.
All towels and bed linen replaced daily.
Pool & grounds, spotless, pool toilets immaculate.
Food, great choice and if you ask and they have ingredients, they'll make it.
Always lovely, great choice, and not one problem.
Staff, really nice people, all the way upto the site managers, always there to help or a giggle with.
Had a great time, thank you.
column4: Hotel Playa Pesquero Resort, Suite & Spa
